Review 1 Text: Excellent experience! The website is easy to use and the offers are great. I was able to book a wonderful hotel at very reasonable prices. The service is fast and responses are instant.
Review 2 Text: Excellent service and fast technical support. I recommend everyone to use this website for hotel bookings. The prices are competitive and the quality is high.
Review 3 Text: Varied offers and competitive prices. I was able to save a lot of money thanks to the exclusive offers. The website is very professional.

Welcome to Abraj Stay (\"we,\" \"our,\": Welcome to Abraj Stay ("we," "our," "us"). Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website, mobile application, or any related services (collectively, the "Platform").
By using our services, you consent to th: By using our services, you consent to the data practices described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please discontinue use of our services.

Social media platforms (if you choose to: Social media platforms (if you choose to connect via social login).
Confirming reservations and providing cu: Confirming reservations and providing customer support.
Enhancing website performance and user e: Enhancing website performance and user experience.

Providing offers, promotions, and update: Providing offers, promotions, and updates (you can opt-out at any time).
Hotels and rental properties need bookin: Hotels and rental properties need booking details to fulfill your reservation.
Secure processing of transactions and fr: Secure processing of transactions and fraud prevention.
IT, analytics, and customer support serv: IT, analytics, and customer support services.
When required by law or to protect our r: When required by law or to protect our rights and users.

We implement technical and organizationa: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or loss. However, no system is 100% secure. Please use strong passwords and avoid sharing sensitive data unnecessarily.

How we use cookies and similar technolog: How we use cookies and similar technologies
This Cookie Policy explains how Abraj St: This Cookie Policy explains how Abraj Stay ("we," "us," or "our") uses cookies and similar technologies on our hotel booking website. By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies as outlined in this policy.
This policy should be read together with: This policy should be read together with our Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions, which provide additional information about how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
Cookies are small text files that are pl: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, tablet, or smartphone) when you visit our website. They are widely used to make websites function efficiently and to provide information to website owners.
Cookies can also be used to remember you: Cookies can also be used to remember your preferences, improve your browsing experience, and provide personalized content and advertising.
Similar technologies include web beacons: Similar technologies include web beacons, pixels, and local storage that serve similar purposes to cookies.
These cookies are essential for the oper: These cookies are essential for the operation of our website. They enable core functionalities such as security, network management, and accessibility. Without these cookies, services you have requested cannot be provided.
These cookies collect information about: These cookies collect information about how you use our website, such as which pages you visit most often and if you receive error messages. This data helps us improve website performance and user experience.
These cookies allow our website to remem: These cookies allow our website to remember choices you make and provide enhanced, more personalized features.
These cookies are used to deliver advert: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements more relevant to you and your interests. They may also limit the number of times you see an advertisement and help measure advertising campaign effectiveness.
We work with third-party service provide: We work with third-party service providers who may set cookies on our website to provide services they offer. These third parties include:
These third parties have their own priva: These third parties have their own privacy policies and cookie policies, which we encourage you to review.
You can manage or disable cookies at any: You can manage or disable cookies at any time through your browser settings. Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings preferences.
However, please note that disabling cook: However, please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website and your ability to use certain features, such as booking accommodations or accessing personalized content.
Important: Strictly necessary cookies ca: Important: Strictly necessary cookies cannot be disabled as they are essential for the website to function properly.
Cookies have different lifespans dependi: Cookies have different lifespans depending on their purpose:
Session cookies: Deleted when you close: Session cookies: Deleted when you close your browser
Persistent cookies: Remain until deleted: Persistent cookies: Remain until deleted or expired
Third-party cookies: Subject to the thir: Third-party cookies: Subject to the third party's retention policies
You can delete cookies at any time throu: You can delete cookies at any time through your browser settings.
We may update this Cookie Policy from ti: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, technologies, legal requirements, or other operational reasons.
When we make material changes to this po: When we make material changes to this policy, we will update the "Last Updated" date at the top of this page and notify you through appropriate channels.
We encourage you to review this policy p: We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about our use of cookies.
Your trusted partner for comprehensive t: Your trusted partner for comprehensive travel solutions, from flights and hotels to specialized services.
Welcome to Abraj Stay (\"we,\" \"our,\": Welcome to Abraj Stay ("we," "our," "us"). By using our website (https://www.abrajstay.com/), mobile application, or any related services (collectively, the "Platform"), you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions ("Terms"). If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use our services.
Our Platform enables users (\"Customers\: Our Platform enables users ("Customers") to search, compare, and book accommodations (hotels, apartments, resorts, etc.) provided by third-party suppliers ("Providers"). We act as an intermediary, facilitating reservations but do not own, manage, or control any accommodations listed.
You must be at least 18 years old to use: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services.
You are responsible for maintaining the: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
You agree to provide accurate, current,: You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information when making a reservation.
When you book an accommodation, you ente: When you book an accommodation, you enter into a direct contract with the Provider. We facilitate the reservation process but are not a party to the agreement.
Payment terms, cancellation policies, an: Payment terms, cancellation policies, and refund eligibility vary by Provider. It is your responsibility to review these before booking.
We may process payments on behalf of Pro: We may process payments on behalf of Providers, but liability for the booking remains with them.
Cancellation policies depend on the Prov: Cancellation policies depend on the Provider's terms. Some bookings may be non-refundable.
Refunds, if applicable, will be processe: Refunds, if applicable, will be processed based on the Provider's policy and may take up to [X] business days.
Service fees charged by Abraj Stay may b: Service fees charged by Abraj Stay may be non-refundable.
Prices displayed on our Platform are set: Prices displayed on our Platform are set by Providers and may include taxes, service fees, or additional charges.
We strive to ensure accurate pricing, bu: We strive to ensure accurate pricing, but errors may occur. In such cases, we reserve the right to cancel the booking and offer an alternative or full refund.
You agree to use the Platform in a lawfu: You agree to use the Platform in a lawful manner and not engage in fraudulent, abusive, or unauthorized activities.
You are responsible for complying with t: You are responsible for complying with the Provider's rules and policies during your stay.
You must not post false reviews, manipul: You must not post false reviews, manipulate ratings, or misrepresent your experience.
We do not guarantee the availability, qu: We do not guarantee the availability, quality, or suitability of accommodations listed on our Platform.
We are not liable for damages, losses, o: We are not liable for damages, losses, or expenses arising from your stay, including but not limited to booking errors, cancellations, property conditions, or safety issues.
Providers are solely responsible for the: Providers are solely responsible for the services they offer, and any claims must be directed to them.
All content on the Platform (logos, trad: All content on the Platform (logos, trademarks, text, images, software) is owned by Abraj Stay or licensed to us. You may not use, copy, or distribute any content without permission.
We reserve the right to update or modify: We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of the Platform after changes take effect constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.
These Terms are governed by the laws of: These Terms are governed by the laws of [Jurisdiction]. Any disputes shall be resolved through arbitration or courts in [Jurisdiction].
